summary: AN ORDINANCE providing for the laying off, opening, widening and establishing of SOUTHWEST ROXBURY STREET from ... 18th Avenue Southwest to ... 4th Avenue Southwest; and of 13th AVENUE SOUTHWEST ... 10th AVENUE SOUTHWEST ... and providing for ... grades thereupon; providing for ... grades upon 12th AVENUE SOUTHWEST ... 11th AVENUE SOUTHWEST ... 9th AVENUE SOUTHWEST ... 8th AVENUE SOUTHWEST ... providing for the condemnation ... therefor, including ... rights ... for cut and fill slopes ... providing for ... a storm drain and sanitary sewer ... and other property ... for general municipal purposes; and providing for payment therefor.
